favorites.title: The Shawshank Redemption
favorites.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

favorites.title: The Godfather
favorites.description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

favorites.title: The Godfather: Part II
favorites.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son expands his grip on the family crime syndicate.

favorites.title: Schindler's List
favorites.description: Oskar Schindler, a businessman in Nazi-occupied Poland, risks everything to save over a thousand Jewish refugees.

favorites.title: Forrest Gump
favorites.description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted man who unwittingly influences historical events.

favorites.title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
favorites.description: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

favorites.title: The Matrix
favorites.description: A hacker discovers the truth about his reality and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

favorites.title: Saving Private Ryan
favorites.description: During World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
